products.title: Aged Beige Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. The taupe tones of aged beige reach charmingly around the room, bringing out the best in both primary colours and neutral hues struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Mushroom Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Offering earthy brown shades with warm undertones, the mushroom satin is an unusual hue ideal for interiors looking for a twist on the classic monochromes. The mid-gloss sheen adds a subtle shimmer without creating glare, making it ideal for high-sunlight areas such as south-facing rooms and conservatories struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Latte Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: A cool khaki tone with a high-beam shine, latte gloss ideal for more rustic environments with a lot of neutral woodgrain or fabric furnishings. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.
